verses.name: 1 Chronicles 5:14
verses.text: These are the children of Abihail the son of Huri, the son of Jaroah, the son of Gilead, the son of Michael, the son of Jeshishai, the son of Jahdo, the son of Buz;

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 5:15
verses.text: Ahi the son of Abdiel, the son of Guni, chief of the house of their fathers.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 5:16
verses.text: And they dwelt in Gilead in Bashan, and in her towns, and in all the suburbs of Sharon, upon their borders.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 5:17
verses.text: All these were reckoned by genealogies in the days of Jotham king of Judah, and in the days of Jeroboam king of Israel.
